    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        java.util.Optional<UserRequest> createAccount​(java.lang.String email,
                                              java.lang.String firstName,
                                              java.lang.String lastName,
                                              java.util.Date dateOfBirth,
                                              java.lang.String password)
        Creates an account which is not validated
        Parameters:
        email - the email to be associated with the account
        firstName - user's first name
        lastName - user's last name
        dateOfBirth - unix time
        password - hex string containing the password
        Returns:
        an Optional - empty if successful - containing the userRequest created by the given parameters, otherwise

      • activateAccount

        boolean activateAccount​(java.lang.String activationToken)
        Activates the account corresponding to the UserRequest with the given activation token
        Parameters:
        activationToken - - activation token used to identify UserRequest
        Returns:
        true if the activation is successful and false otherwise

      • deleteMonthlyBudget

        ServiceEmptyResponse deleteMonthlyBudget​(int budgetId,
                                         int userId)
        Deletes a monthly budget of a given user
        Parameters:
        budgetId - id of the budget to be deleted
        userId - id of the user who requested the deletion
        Returns:
        a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=200 in case of success a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=403 in case the budget with the given id is not owned by the user with the given userId a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=500 in case the delete operation fails

      • getExpenseTotalByCategory

        java.util.Map<ExpenseCategory,​java.lang.Double> getExpenseTotalByCategory​(int userId,
                                                                                java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                                                java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Method for retrieving the total amount of a user's expenses within a time period, grouped by expense category
        Parameters:
        userId - , identifier of the user whose expenses are taken into account
        start - , the start of the considered time period
        end - , the end of the considered time period
        Returns:
        a Map where each key represents an ExpenseCategory and the value, the total amount of expenses of that category

      • updateMonthlyBudget

        MonthlyBudgetViewModel updateMonthlyBudget​(int budgetId,
                                           MonthlyBudgetDto monthlyBudgetDto)
                                    throws ServiceException
        Updates a monthly budget
        Parameters:
        budgetId - id of the budget to be updated
        monthlyBudgetDto - a dto object of the monthly budget to be updated
        Returns:
        the viewModel of the updated monthly budget
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if the budget can't be updated
